name: thumb
posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

trans_examp.trans_en: the short, thick finger on the side of your hand that makes it possible to hold and pick things up easily

name: thumb
posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

dsense_body_def_block_kk.def: to stand near the edge of a road and hold out your hand with the thumb raised as a signal for a vehicle to stop and take you somewhere
dsense_body_def_block_kk.ddef_b_trans: 竖起拇指要求免费搭车

example.eg: We thumbed a lift to London.

dsense_body_def_block_kk.def: to show no respect, or to raise the end of your thumb to the end of your nose to show that you do not respect someone

example.eg: He has thumbed his nose at authority all his life.
